sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; const Home = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_zfgmd0g', 'template_3qm0lv7', e.target, 'u4EiNgak02C5AjR_R') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); alert('Your message has been sent. Thank you!'); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); alert('Your message has been sent. Thank you so much! '); }); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Where accuracy meets compassion

TSC as low as 2.44%

Having the statement care as your partner for billing and credentialing needs, means efficiency and accuracy.

Get Started Watch Video
{/* /Hero Section */} {/* Contact Section */}

Address

307 west Parker rd Plummerville, AR 72127

Call Us

+1 (917) 690-2742 or +1 (501) 777-5431

Email Us

thestatementc@gmail.com
